alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 10:59PM CDT until July 10 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in north central Kansas... Jewell County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Eastern Osborne County in north central Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1059 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burr Oak to near Cawker City to 7 miles north of Lucas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Burr Oak and Ionia around 1105 PM CDT. Glen Elder and Hunter around 1110 PM CDT. Mankato around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Victor, Jewell, Montrose, Beloit, Webber, Lovewell State Park, Formoso, Randall and Scottsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
